original_text: Jacob's descendants will be strong again, as they were long ago. They will serve me together as one group of people. I will punish anyone who wants to hurt them. Jacob's descendants will be strong again, as they were long ago. They will serve me together as one group of people. I will punish anyone who wants to hurt them. Jacob's descendants will be strong again,
korean_text: 그의 자손은 예전과 같겠고 그 회중은 내 앞에 굳게 설 것이며 그를 압박하는 모든 사람은 내가 다 벌하리라

sentences.original_text: Jacob's descendants will be strong again
